Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance pursuant to subsections 292(2)a and 463(1)b of the Cooperative Credit Associations Actc, hereby makes the annexed Annual Statement (Cooperative Credit Associations) Regulations.

Section.Text: The prescribed statements referred to in subsection 292(2) of the Cooperative Credit Associations Act are

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a balance sheet as at the end of the financial year;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a statement of income for the financial year;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a statement of cash flows for the financial year;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: a statement of changes in equity for the financial year; and

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: a statement of comprehensive income for the financial year.

Section.Text: These Regulations come into force on June 1, 2011.
